analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol#29-178) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol#88-94)

OneExchangeToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol#186-188)
TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol#33)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0xa62a4a579c8a18ca8aed837aa8825a74e2e54a4f.sol#1): it allows old versions
